staxel.village.dialogue.festival.FeyQuee: Oh, hello. We almost didn't see you there.
Are you here to attend our masquerade this year?
It's a bit unfortunate but we may need to cancel it this time...
A few of our subjects are... well... not the most civil.
It would seem the manor has been put completely out of sorts.
Perhaps you might help out by catching some of the ^c:d03e37;mischievous fairies^c:pop;?
Only the mischievous ones though! Leave the innocent ^c:d03e37;fairies^c:pop; be!
You could also help by repairing some of the damaged rooms...
What to do...
What's going on?
What can I do to help?
Which rooms are left?
Hmm...
I caught a fairy!
You're willing to help us out? Fantastic!
The core of the matter is that the manor has become a bit... disorderly.
There are two things you can do that would exceedingly useful.
The first is to hunt down all the ^c:d03e37;mischievous fairies^c:pop;.
That way we might be able to recover some of the bits and pieces they made off with!
You can most likely catch them flying around by using a ^c:d03e37;bug net^c:pop;.
Don't disturb innocent ^c:d03e37;fairies^c:pop; though! Our kin do not usually intend harm!
A ^c:d03e37;mischievous fairy^c:pop; can be recognised by its ^c:1486b0;reddish glow^c:pop;!
As for putting the manor's rooms back into order...
It looks like we're all set on that front! Good work!
Otherwise, you can try and put the manor's rooms back into order...
We imagine you might find some pieces of furniture out of place in other rooms...
Maybe some of it you'll have to recover by capturing ^c:d03e37;mischievous fairies^c:pop;...
It looks like some furniture is missing from ^c:1486b0;room 101^c:pop; in the left wing.
^c:1486b0;Room 104^c:pop; in the right wing could probably do with a bit of reorganising.
Normally we would already be holding our grand masquerade...
However, certain mischievous fey have taken to pulling apart our manor...
It was hard work bringing it here from the fairy realm!
Would that a kind soul might help us repair the damage...
Why at such an important time...?
Our patience with some of our kin begins to wear thin...
Ah, excellent! May we take them off your hands for disciplining?
Sure!
Um... disciplining?
Hmm... wait... those-!
Ah, no! What did we say about snatching innocent ^c:d03e37;fairies^c:pop;?!
Hold still little one, we'll soon have you free...
Please focus on catching ^c:d03e37;mischievous fairies^c:pop; only...
We sense no fairies in our presence...
Are you certain that you found some?
Please do let us know if you manage to capture one!
Well now... if you're certain you won't comply...
Let us know if you change your mind.
Now... let us see what they made off with!
Ah, excellent, it would appear that we have recovered some parts of the wall!
These may help you with the repairs!
Oh, it would appear this little one was making off with a segment of roofing!
Perhaps it may be of use in tidying up one of the rooms?
Aha! This would appear to be the table that was missing from ^c:1486b0;106^c:pop;!
How did it manage to bear this weight...?
Regardless, please do return it to its rightful place!
Oh my! It would appear the manor has been completely restored!
Excellent work ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Now our masquerade can proceed as planned!
For your hard work, please allow us to bestow these items upon you!
Should you happen to come across any more ^c:d03e37;mischievous fairies^c:pop;...
Do feel free to bring them to us and we'll see that you're well rewarded!
Perhaps we might bequeath some of our designer furniture in exchange!
The masquerade is all set to proceed as planned!
What can we do for you on this fine day ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
I caught a fairy!
Nothing really!
What would you like from us in exchange?
Arm Chair
Drawers
Sofa
Glass Table
Lamp
Large Table
A fine choice indeed!
Small Table
You still need to put everything in ^c:1486b0;room 105^c:pop; back in its rightful place!
I really want to see ^c:1486b0;room 106^c:pop; restored to its former glory...
If you go upstairs, ^c:1486b0;room 203^c:pop; is missing a part of its roof!
^c:1486b0;Room 204^c:pop; can barely be called a room any more...
We probably need to rebuild a chunk of the roof in ^c:1486b0;room 206^c:pop;.
^c:1486b0;Room 207^c:pop; is in a bit of a sorry state...
^c:d03e37;Mischievous fairies^c:pop; really did a number on ^c:1486b0;room 208^c:pop;! Please work out what's missing!
